synopsis.text: Naruto's 20th anniversary is commemorated in a special music video released by Studio Pierrot on their YouTube channel. The video features a compilation of iconic moments from both Naruto and Naruto Shippuden, but with a twist - all scenes have been re-animated with fresh and updated visuals. The only scene with dialogue is the opening one, showcasing a part of the epic battle between Naruto Uzumaki and Sasuke Uchiha. This anniversary tribute is a must-watch for fans of the franchise, offering a new perspective on beloved moments from the series.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
